title: Draft
description: JSON Schema for Draft data structures

$schema.description: path to the JSON Schema to use for the validation of the data structure

draftId.description: unique identifier of the film for which this review invitation has been issued

reviewId.description: unique identifier of the film for which this review invitation has been issued

authorId.description: unique identifier of the the user who generates the draft

contributorsId.description: unique identifier of the the users who has received this draft check invitation

open.description: true if the review still requires responses, false otherwise

draftDate.description: the date when the draft has been issued by the author

rating.description: the rating the reviewer has given to the film

review.description: a textual description of the review

responses.description: an array containing responses from all users
